Governor-General to visit Tairāwhiti, investitures part of triphttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/06/18/governor-general-to-visit-tairawhiti-investitures-part-of-trip/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/06/18/governor-general-to-visit-tairawhiti-investitures-part-of-trip/ Dame Cindy Kiro will get a first-hand look at flood-stricken communities. Mon, 17 Jun 2024 22:40:01 +0000 Governor General Dame Cindy Kiro and husband Dr Richard Davies are touring flood-affected parts of Tairawhiti and Hawke's Bay from today. Part of their five-day tour will feature investiture ceremonies in Tolaga Bay and Ruatōria.
